mapper.update: update config set biz_code = #{bizCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, config_code = #{configCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, config_info = #{configInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_code = #{parentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, child_code = #{childCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `valid` = #{valid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, biz_code, config_code, config_info, parent_code, child_code, `valid` from config
